cons: Some durability and longevity concerns noted

The magnet on the back works great for mounting the unit on the side of a car or on a hood. Also the unit has preformed well in the rain without tripping any barkers. Don't forget to hit the Helpful button....keep these awesome reviews coming.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger / maintainer
customer_reviews.text: I have a Suburban with a 6.5L diesel engine with a dual battery setup and and it has an engine heater in it that has to be plugged in on cold winter nights. I permanently mounted this 2-amp charger in the engine compartment on the firewall above the brake master cylinder and used the included ring-connector cable to attach it to the posts on the drivers-side battery. I leave the power cord plugged in to a dual-outlet cord with the engine heater. Now, when I plug the heater cord in at night, the charger also comes on and tops off the charge on the batteries. I am well pleased with it so far.
